sentences.en: He heard whizz of a bullet near his ear.
sentences.cn: 他听到耳边有子弹的飕飕声.

sentences.en: He is a whizz at football.
sentences.cn: 他是一位打橄榄球的高手.

sentences.en: I saw many soldiers whizz past in a truck.
sentences.cn: 我看见一辆载有许多士兵的卡车飞驰而过.

sentences.en: Jacks a whizz on the PC and just pressed all thecenterbuttons, Rachel Neal said.
sentences.cn: 母亲雷切尔·尼尔说:“杰克是个电脑神童,他完全按对了所有选项键.”

sentences.en: Simon's a whizz at card games.
Stewart felt a bottle whizz past his head.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特感觉有个瓶子从他头上嗖地一下飞了过去。

words.tran_cn: 专家；精明的人；子弹等在空中掠过的声音（等于whiz）
